casebody.data:
Fred Stone, Respondent v. John Devlin, Appellant. Decided March 2, 1891. Appeal from a judgment entered on the verdict of a jury and from an order denying a motion for a new trial upon the minutes. *578Horace Graves, for appellant. Sandford H. Steele, for respondent.

Before Truax and Dugro, JJ.

The Court (Dugro, J., writing, Truax, J., concurring) affirmed the judgment and order. .
